Title: Authorizes the department of environmental conservation to temporarily waive fuel and fuel additive requirements in extreme and unusual circumstances
Summary: Authorizes the department of environmental conservation to temporarily waive fuel and fuel additive requirements in extreme and unusual circumstances; requires such circumstances to be unforeseeable or as the result of a natural disaster.
LawCode: Amd ยง19-0301, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to authorizing the department of environmental conservation to temporarily waive fuel and fuel additive requirements in extreme and unusual circumstances
